# <a name="print-email-calendars-and-attachments"></a><span data-ttu-id="c0ee0-102">Imprimir correio electrónico, calendários e anexos</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c0ee0-102">Print email, calendars, and attachments</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c0ee0-103">Para imprimir uma mensagem de correio electrónico no Outlook na web:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c0ee0-103">To print an email message in Outlook on the web:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="c0ee0-104">Seleccione a mensagem que pretende imprimir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c0ee0-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="c0ee0-105">No canto superior direito da mensagem, seleccione três pontos e, em seguida, seleccione **Imprimir**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c0ee0-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots and then select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c0ee0-106">Para imprimir o calendário:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c0ee0-106">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c0ee0-107">No canto superior direito da página, seleccione</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c0ee0-107">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="c0ee0-108">**Imprimir**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c0ee0-108">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="c0ee0-109">Escolha o intervalo de vista e a hora e seleccione **Imprimir**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c0ee0-109">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c0ee0-110">Para imprimir um anexo:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c0ee0-110">To print an attachment:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c0ee0-111">Abra a mensagem que contém o anexo que pretende imprimir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c0ee0-111">Open the message that contains the attachment you want to print.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="c0ee0-112">Mova o cursor sobre o anexo e seleccione o ícone de **transferência**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c0ee0-112">Move your cursor over the attachment and select the **Download** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /><span data-ttu-id="c0ee0-113">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c0ee0-113"></span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="c0ee0-114">Depois de ter transferido o ficheiro, abra-o com o programa adequado e escolha a opção para imprimir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c0ee0-114">After the file has downloaded, open it with the appropriate program and choose the option to print.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c0ee0-115">Por exemplo, abrir um ficheiro. doc no Word e, em seguida, imprimir.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c0ee0-115">For example, open a .doc file in Word and then print.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c0ee0-116">Para obter mais informações, consulte [mensagens de correio electrónico de impressão, anexos e calendários do Outlook na web](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c0ee0-116">To learn more, see [Print email messages, attachments, and calendars in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/2cf529d1-3b8f-4de2-b254-b7f870e58a2b).</span></span>
